Class BuildYourOwnTest

java.lang.Object
com.order.navigationdesign.BuildYourOwnTest
public class BuildYourOwnTest extends Object
This class tests the BuildYourOwn class price() method.
Author:
Aveesh Patel, Patryk Dziedzic
